Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Sales and Account Manager to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for driving sales, nurturing client relationships, and overseeing the smooth operation of warehouse and delivery procedures to ensure customer satisfaction. This role is critical in achieving our mission to deliver quality food products on time and as efficiently as possible.ResponsibilitiesDevelop and execute sales strategies to meet and exceed revenue targets.
Identify and nurture client relationships within the food supply sphere, including retailers, hotels, restaurants, wholesalers, and other business partners.
Communication with potential customers and business partners.
Current customers support and communication (incl.accurate document flow). Development of long-term, trusting relationships with customers.
Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits.
Warehouse operation control, Work closely with the warehouse team to optimize inventory control, including stock levels and turnover.
Сontrol of delivery of goods from the warehouse to the customer.
Ensure the timely and successful order delivery. 
Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and other feedback, providing excellent customer service to maintain high levels of customer satisfaction.
Connecting with key business executives and stakeholders and preparing sales reports.
Work in compliance with food safety standards and regulations.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in a related field.
A minimum of 3 years’ experience in a sales or account management role, preferably within the food supply chain or a related industry.
Strong understanding of warehouse operations, logistics, and supply chain management.
Exceptional verbal and written communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, and familiarity with CRM software.
Strong problem-solving skills, with an ability to think quickly under pressure.
Must be willing to travel as required.
